timeline.message: Add the ability of setting aria-label text to HTML elements.
Fix a spelling issue and all characters of 'screenoptions' should be lowercase.

timeline.bodyText: This seems curious.. You check to see if state.getLabelText() is not empty, however then you use just plain getLabelText() rather than state.getLabelText(). Considering the getLabelText() implementation in AbstractComponentRenderer simply does the state.getLabelText() you could stick to only using that for both calls.
